quotes.quote: All you gotta do is chill out… Let go of control and chill out… Let it be, Trust.
Loosen up. Relax. Except for rare life-and-death matters, nothing is as important as it first seems.
If you relax your mind, it can begin working for you.
Be patient. Relax and trust. Let go. Then, let go some more.
Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
It's really important to have balance, spend some time in nature, go to a few parties, enjoy my friends and really chill out.
Loosen up, and everybody around you will loosen up.
Whenever in doubt, turn off your mind, relax, float downstream.
Relax, ease back in your seats and let the music take you wherever it does.
Relax and calm your mind. Forget about yourself and follow your opponent's movement.
We should all relax about life because you don't have a clue as to what's really going on.
The ability to relax and be mindfully present in the moment comes naturally when we are grateful.
Life is vital and we should relax a little and enjoy it as we only have one life as far as I'm aware.
When a man wants to relax, he will slob out and really relax. Or he will pursue a hobby - anything from building models to watching sport.
Relax. Just relax and have fun doing what you're doing. Don't worry so much about being results oriented. Just commit yourself to the moment.
Chill out, relax and have an open mind.
Never mind of what your enemy thinks of you, relax and think a head of him.
It is necessary to relax your muscles when you can. Relaxing your brain is fatal.
It is in human nature to relax, when not compelled by personal advantage or disadvantage.
